headline: As Boeing Scrutinizes 737 Max, New Safety Risks Come to Light
abstract: The company and regulators are looking into everything from the wiring on the plane to its engines.
lead_paragraph: Even as Boeing inches closer to getting the 737 Max back in the air, new problems with the plane are emerging that go beyond the software that played a role in two deadly crashes.
keywords: Boeing 737 Max Groundings and Safety Concerns (2019)
